concept.title: Processing Rules
concept.shortdesc: Certified administrators can change SiteCatalyst data as it is received, which simplifies interaction with IT groups and Web developers.

ul.li: Populate variables using query string parameters.
Copy an eVar into a Prop to see paths.
Set an Event on a page or when a value is matched.
Use Context Data variables to simplify data collection.

conbody.p: Certification training is required before you can create or edit processing rules. Contact your Account Manager for more information.
See Processing Rules in the Analytics Reference Help.
